document.full_text: brett gardner got his first start of the season against a left-hander, pushing andruw jones to the d.h. spot and the struggling jorge posada to the bench.
document.title: girardi shuffles order against blue jays' romero, leaving out posada
lines_and_colors: brett gardner got his first start of the season against a left-hander, pushing andruw jones to the d.h. spot and the struggling jorge posada to the bench.
